content: * *JL Studio** is a restaurant in [Taiwan](/wiki/Taiwan) specializing in [Singaporean cuisine](/wiki/Singaporean_cuisine). It has been awarded three [Michelin stars](/wiki/Michelin_star). JL Studio is located in [Taichung](/wiki/Taichung). ## History JL Studio was founded by Singaporean chef Jimmy Lim Tyan Yaw in 2017. Jimmy's father was also a chef. The restaurant is a mix of Singaporean cuisine, Taiwanese ingredients, and French techniques. ## Awards and recognition In 2020, JL Studio was awarded a second Michelin star, becoming the highest rated Singaporean restaurant in the world. JL Studio was awarded a third Michelin star in 2023. It was one of only two restaurants in Taiwan to be awarded three stars and remained the highest rated Singaporean restaurant in the world. - [List of Michelin-starred restaurants in Taiwan](/wiki/List_of_Michelin-starred_restaurants_in_Taiwan)
title: JL Studio
